DOC.brief_summary: Aim : The purpose study learn person recovers treatment mallet finger injury . The investigator want identify best outcome mallet finger injury improve treatment strategy . Primary null hypothesis : There statistically significant factor associate extensor lag 4 week 4 month immobilization discontinue mallet finger among demographic , injury , treatment factor . Secondary null hypothesis : There statistically significant factor associate PROMIS upper extremity function 4 week 4 month completion immobilization mallet finger among demographic , psychological , injury , treatment factor .
DOC.brief_title: Residual Extensor Lag Approximately 1 Month After Splint Cast Immobilization Mallet Finger
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old English fluency literacy Mallet finger fracture nonfracture Mallet finger subluxation nonsubluxation Pregnant Women
